availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mustered in on March 5, 1862. Consolidated with the 33rd Kentucky Infantry on April 1, 1864. Veteranized in the Department of the Tennessee until December 1864, when it joined the Army of the Potomac. Mustered out on July 10, 1865. Commander(s): Colonels Stephen B. Burbridge, Cicero Maxwell, and Thomas B. Farleigh.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky_, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 198, 233, 733,.
Frederick Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion (Des Moines: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1208.
